MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the G83 postcode area of Glasgow. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 7:45pm to repair an underground cable fault located at the junction of Pier road and Ballach Road  and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1:00am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:12pm on Thursday the 22nd April 2021.
